name: v0.11.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_jni", version = "0.11.1")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_jni",
    sha256 = "68b2a58e3b9160053052f9c860a5b6f8872a04f1d1c09b9bddff62485dfad8a9",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jni-0.11.1",
    url = "https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/releases/download/v0.11.1/rules_jni-v0.11.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_jni//jni:repositories.bzl", "rules_jni_dependencies")

rules_jni_dependencies()
```


## What's Changed
* Fix tests with Bazel@HEAD by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/129
* Remove usages of `incompatible_use_toolchain_transition` by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/130
* Remove unnecessary WORKSPACE setup by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/131


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/compare/v0.11.0...v0.11.1

name: v0.11.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_jni", version = "0.11.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_jni",
    sha256 = "181363c9d7aefd33e8b4e1f24f75c29665551298e5634e8c801e624fa8b0ca18",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jni-0.11.0",
    url = "https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/releases/download/v0.11.0/rules_jni-v0.11.0.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Test and fix docs for Bazel 8 by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/124
* Update apple_support in tests by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/126
* Set BAZEL_LLVM_PROFDATA by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/127
* Add explicit loads by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/128


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/compare/v0.10.3...v0.11.0

name: v0.10.3

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_jni", version = "0.10.3")
```

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/compare/v0.10.2...v0.10.3

name: v0.10.2
body:
## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_jni", version = "0.10.2")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_jni",
    sha256 = "0483aa305bffc8968591330f7efa5805d4dc37b8fc8d083f3cff1f63928abf37",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jni-0.10.2",
    url = "https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/releases/download/v0.10.2/rules_jni-v0.10.2.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Update GitHub actions by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/118
* Fixes for Bazel 8 and stardoc 0.7.1 by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/119
* Fix and test with Bazel 8 in BCR by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/120
* Add release workflow by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/121
* Fix release workflow by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/122


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/compare/v0.10.1...v0.10.2

name: v0.10.1
body:
## What's Changed

Only tests for the BCR were changed in this release, it is otherwise identical to v0.10.0.

* Add `bazel` matrix to `presubmit.yml` by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/115
* Update `JAVA_HOME` for BCR centos7 runner by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/117
* Bump rules_java to 7.3.2 in tests by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/116


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/compare/v0.10.0...v0.10.1

name: v0.10.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Drop support for Bazel 5 by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/112
* Update JNI file URLs and simplify Bzlmod setup by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/111
* Switch to Bzlmod for the main repository by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/113
* Restructure ruleset to conform to style guide by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/114


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/compare/v0.9.1...v0.10.0

name: v0.9.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix `strip_prefix` in `.bcr/source.template.json` by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/109


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/compare/v0.9.0...v0.9.1

name: v0.9.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Change order of dependencies in libjvm_stub target to fix potential linker errors by @sfc-gh-tmarzec in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/107
* Update headers to JDK 22 Build 12 by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/105
* Update JNI headers for Bzlmod by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/106
* Add rules_license support by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/22
* Point `.bcr/source.template.json` to the release archive by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/108

## New Contributors
* @sfc-gh-tmarzec made their first contribution in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/107

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/compare/v0.8.0...v0.9.0

name: v0.8.0
body:
## What's Changed
* **Breaking change:** The minimum supported version of Bazel has been raised to 5.0.0.
* Fix coverage with Bzlmod by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/97
* Update example with comments for default arguments by @marktefftech in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/100
* README: Fix minor typo by @cpsauer in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/101
* Make Java runtime dependency of `libjvm` optional if supported by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/103

## New Contributors
* @marktefftech made their first contribution in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/100
* @cpsauer made their first contribution in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/101

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/compare/v0.7.0...v0.8.0

name: v0.7.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Android support by @TheCoryBarker in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/95

## New Contributors
* @TheCoryBarker made their first contribution in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/95

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/compare/v0.6.1...v0.7.0

name: v0.6.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix aspects not picking up merge_{cc,java}_infos by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/92


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1

name: v0.6.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update JNI headers for Java 19 by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/85
* Add RulesJni#extractLibrary by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/87

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/compare/v0.5.2...v0.6.0

name: v0.5.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Remove some unnecessary uses of .path by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/79
* Support slashes in target names by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/81

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/compare/v0.5.1...v0.5.2

name: v0.5.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Generate coverage reports in temporary directory by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/71
* Create temporary COVERAGE_DIR in TEST_TMPDIR by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/72
* Do not leak Runfiles instances by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/74
* Ensure coverage profile is written only once by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/76
* Fix coverage collection for Java agents by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/75


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1

## WORKSPACE snippet
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "fmeum_rules_jni",
    sha256 = "45acc80812e0ecafc3f1b2f17efa6141d014aa2cf49c94a83252f570124d161a",
    strip_prefix = "rules_jni-0.5.1",
    url = "https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/archive/refs/tags/v0.5.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@fmeum_rules_jni//jni:repositories.bzl", "rules_jni_dependencies")

rules_jni_dependencies()
```

name: v0.5.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Set runfiles env vars in libjvm_stub by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/57
* Use GetEnvironmentVariableA on Windows by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/58
* Use the proper message prefix for errors in libjvm_stub by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/60
* Improve docs for rules_jni_init by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/61
* Prevent loading native libraries with same basename by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/67
* Use correct shared library extension for temporary files by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/69
* Add coverage support for `*_jni_library` by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/59
* Add coverage support to libjvm by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/70


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/compare/v0.4.2...v0.5.0

body:
## What's Changed
* `/usr/libexec/java_home` is now used as a fallback for `JAVA_HOME` on macOS (https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/41)


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/compare/v0.3.1...v0.4.0

```starlark
    strip_prefix = "rules_jni-0.4.0",

)

```

name: v0.3.1
body:
## What's Changed
* No user-facing changes, but initial packaging for the Bazel Central Registry.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/compare/v0.3.0...v0.3.1

name: v0.2.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Simplify tags on intermediate targets in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/18
* Redesign JNI library rules in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/19

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/compare/v0.1.1...v0.2.0

name: v0.1.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Add missing //jni dep on java_native_library without java_lib in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/6
* Fix Windows jvm.dll paths in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/7
* Remove utils.h from libjvm runfiles in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/8
* Make buildozer fixes for original Java library slightly more useful in https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/pull/9

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/compare/v0.1.0...v0.1.1

## WORKSPACE snippet
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "fmeum_rules_jni",
    sha256 = "9d17a403ccb8b005fdb490a0e94942f163d55fdbb4a3e51fb135bd44e174d170",
    url = "https://github.com/fmeum/rules_jni/releases/download/v0.1.1/rules_jni-v0.1.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@fmeum_rules_jni//jni:repositories.bzl", "rules_jni_dependencies")

rules_jni_dependencies()
```
